source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot from the perspective of a car driving down a city street at night. The view through the windshield shows the road ahead, illuminated by streetlights, traffic signals, and the lights of other vehicles. A large truck is visible on the right side of the road as the car moves forward.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot from the perspective of a car driving down a city street at night. The view through the windshield shows the road ahead, illuminated by streetlights, traffic signals, and the lights of other vehicles. A large truck is visible on the right side of the road as the car moves forward.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that pedestrians are crossing the street in front of the car as it moves forward.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenery shot from the perspective of a car driving down a city street at night. The view through the windshield shows the road ahead, illuminated by streetlights, traffic signals, and the lights of other vehicles. Pedestrians are crossing the street in front of the car as it moves forward, and a large truck is visible on the right side of the road.
